interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UV LED Nail Lamp 36w, Portable USB Gel Nail Dryer, Polish Nail Light for Home and Travel, White
Review Date: 2020/10/29
Store: KOCECER
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KOCECER', 'Special Feature': 'Rechargeable', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Room Type': 'Usb', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Package Dimensions': '7.9 x 7.5 x 3.5 inches; 10.09 Ounces', 'UPC': '791555028525'}
Review Text: This is a nice little UV & LED cure lamp, it is smaller than the other ones I have, so it takes up less space.  It is a bit more costly for what you get, compared with similar items, at $26 that is a slight negative for me.  This does come with little gloves that were to protect the skin, and I'm sure they help a little bit.  I did have plenty of room to cure my full hand, but I did my thump separately.  I find that when you use these lamps it is best to turn on the lamp and slowly insert your hand with the timer started so you don't get those heat spikes.  I did not have any problems with cure time or curing with this lamp.  I will continue to use it and if I have any issues, I will reevaluate my review accordingly.  Dropping a star for the cost.
Review Title: Cute little lamp, takes up 7.5 " or 19 cm squared of table space.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ECBASKET 500 PCS Stiletto False Nails Short Acrylic Nail Tips 10 sizes Full Coverage Fake Nails (100PCS Nail Forms) ECBASKET {'Size': 'Small', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ECBASKET', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 3.25 x 0.75 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '701392295127'} A decent product for a decent price. These are nice and flexible, making removal super easy. They can be reused, once you clean them and sanitize them with rubbing alcohol. These are more square at the cuticle area, great for those with a more square shaped nail bed, my thumbs are pretty square. They come in 10 sizes (10 of each size) and the sizes are reasonable sizing too. I have dual forms from another brand and half of them are unreasonably HUGE, whereas these are for normal people. For my thumb I used size 2 and my other fingers fit 4-8. They came in a plastic organizer case that is way smaller than my other case, so they don't take up a ton of room in my nail station. The latch on mine didn't close tight, so I had to use a piece of tape, but I'm not taking off any stars because that didn't affect the usefulness of the product itself. All in all, the C curve was perfect, easy to load, cure and pinch off. I found these to be perfect for anyone who wants a square cuticle line, rather than a round one. I purchased this thru my Amazon Prime account and did not receive any compensation for this completely unbiased review. I found these to be perfect for anyone who wants a square cuticle line, rather than a round one. 10Pack 2oz Plastic Empty Spray Bottle, Mostof Fine Mist Small Clear Travel Plastic Bottles Container with Funnels Labels Mostof {'Brand': 'Mostof', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Reusability': 'Reusable', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 6.3 x 3.9 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '634715829481'} This is a nice spray bottle kit, it comes with 2 funnels and a sheet of labels, I found the labels too small for use, each one is approximately 1 inch x 1/2 inch in diameter, and not sure if it can be used in an inkjet printer or not. All 10 spray bottles included all the necessary parts, and the stem that draws up liquid was long in each one, none were short and I really appreciated that. You should be able to spray down to the last drop. I tested mine with rubbing alcohol, for sanitizing my phones. The funnel came in handy for filling the bottle. It made the job so easy! The sprayer does spray a very fine mist. I used it several times to clean some things then left it overnight with the cap on. Next day I tested it again. First off, the cap contained some of the rubbing alcohol inside it, which means the container will leak into the cap standing up. Not necessarily a huge deal breaker, but a negative for me. Holding it in my hand I got the rubbing alcohol on my finger too, so this may waste product just from this. Several drops every 24 hours may not seem like a lot, but if you make your own essential oil room spray then this could be an expensive waste. Lastly, I had an issue with the spray top, the angle is so slight I wasn't sure if I would spray myself in the face of I wasn't wearing eyeglasses. You have to be careful, ensuring you're spraying away from yourself. I did not get any leakage of the alcohol out of the cap, it seemed pretty tight. It did pool in the cap, didn't run down the bottle. I did get a rubbing alcohol ring when I set down the cap on my coffee table tho. Beware of that possibility whatever you use in these bottles.
All in all, a nice kit and I give it 4 stars. I got leaking inside the cap, but it didn't come out. UV LED Nail Lamp 36w, Portable USB Gel Nail Dryer, Polish Nail Light for Home and Travel, White KOCECER {'Brand': 'KOCECER', 'Special Feature': 'Rechargeable', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Room Type': 'Usb', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Package Dimensions': '7.9 x 7.5 x 3.5 inches; 10.09 Ounces', 'UPC': '791555028525'} This is a nice little UV & LED cure lamp, it is smaller than the other ones I have, so it takes up less space. It is a bit more costly for what you get, compared with similar items, at $26 that is a slight negative for me. This does come with little gloves that were to protect the skin, and I'm sure they help a little bit. I did have plenty of room to cure my full hand, but I did my thump separately. I find that when you use these lamps it is best to turn on the lamp and slowly insert your hand with the timer started so you don't get those heat spikes. I did not have any problems with cure time or curing with this lamp. I will continue to use it and if I have any issues, I will reevaluate my review accordingly. Dropping a star for the cost. Cute little lamp, takes up 7.5 " or 19 cm squared of table space.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Nail Aesthetics:** Prefers acrylic nail solutions, specifically valuing flexibility and ease of removal, with a clear preference for square cuticle shapes over round ones.

- **Product Size Consideration:** Values various size options in products, favoring those that accommodate different nail beds and occupy minimal space for organization.

- **Review Style:** Provides detailed feedback focused on usability, value for money, and balanced perspectives, addressing minor flaws without significantly detracting from overall satisfaction.

- **Organization and Space Efficiency:** Prefers compact storage solutions in products, reflecting a tendency towards organized and efficient spaces in nail care routines. Recently engaged with products that are smaller and lightweight for easier storage.

- **Purchase Behavior:** Regularly utilizes platforms like Amazon Prime for convenience in purchasing, indicating strong familiarity with online shopping.

- **General Sentiment:** Expresses positive experiences with functional and aesthetically appealing products, while also emphasizing practical needs and efficient design.

- **Interest in Versatile Products:** Shows a growing interest in versatile, reusable tools that enhance personal care routines, including skincare and nail care items that facilitate effective use and convenience.

- **Recent Interaction Insights:** Engaged positively with a compact, portable nail lamp that offers space efficiency and functionality, although balancing this with concerns about pricing. Maintained a focus on usability and future re-evaluation based on continued use. 

Overall, the user displays a keen interest in practical nail care and organization, emphasizing aesthetic appeal and functional design in their product preferences.
